items.text: shortens his length, but he gets on top of the bounce and blocks.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: steps out and whips this indrifter to deep square leg.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, 2 runs

items.text: gets right to the pitch of the ball and smothers this full delivery.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: width and he's slapped this into the gap, towards sweeper cover.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: premeditated paddle, the slip fielder read it early and moved across to take this with a leap, but it just eluded him. Superb, full marks for the effort.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Ervine, 1 run

items.text: big appeal for lbw but the ball pitched miles outside leg. Ervine was beaten for pace and this hit him in line. No doubt where it was headed, but certainly there was an issue with where it pitched.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ervine, no run

items.text: defends from the crease towards midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ervine, no run

items.text: whips this from length on middle towards deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ervine, 2 runs

items.text: dabs this gently into the off side as they scamper a quick single.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ervine, 1 run

items.text: veers in late, length much fuller as well. Raza defends with his bat close to the pad.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: attacks the stumps with a length ball again, defended back with soft hands.
items.postText: Time for drinks in Mirpur. Can Kohli get a double century in a chase in Guwahati?
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.preText:
Barnvagn Sristy: "Sikandar raza would be the big fish for tigers. "


Welcome back. Apu to continue
items.text: lunges forward and turns this gently into the leg side.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Ervine, no run

items.text: steps out and works this with the spin to long-on.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Ervine, 1 run

items.text: mistimes a cut to extra cover.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: nice flight, he gets to the pitch of the ball and smothers this nicely.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: lunges forward and smothers this away
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: drifts in and skids through, Raza right behind the line in defence.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: stands tall and bunts this into the point region for a quick single.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ervine, 1 run

items.text: punched into the deep cover region for an easy single.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: dropped by Mushfiqur! Thick bottom edge as he feels for the ball away from the body, this kept going away, looked like the keeper was late to move and was on the move as he put this down.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ervine, 1 run

items.text: deflects off the thigh pad into the leg side, looked to work this off his hip initially.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: walks out of the crease and drives this to mid-off for a quick single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Ervine, 1 run

items.text: width outside off, slashed down to third man.
items.postText: Quite a crawl for Zimbabwe. Hemant sure isn't crawling, but jumping around to get back into commentary.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: short of length and spinning away, Raza cuts it towards sweeper cover
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: fuller around off stumps, turned away towards square leg
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Ervine, no run
